description:
Drone Delivery Express: City Simulator is a relaxing drone delivery game set in a realistic modern city. Your main mission is simple: take off, fly across the streets and rooftops, and deliver different packages safely and on time.

Choose from multiple drones and enjoy smooth, satisfying gameplay that’s easy to learn and fun to master. Each level introduces new delivery routes and fresh challenges, while the atmosphere constantly changes thanks to dynamic time and weather—bright daytime flights, beautiful sunsets, and rainy nights.

Fly with precision, plan your path, and enjoy a calm simulation experience made for players who want to unwind.
